de.codescape.bitvunit.report
Class AbstractReportWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.codescape.bitvunit.report.AbstractReportWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextReportWriter, XmlReportWriter
public abstract class AbstractReportWriter
extends Object
implements ReportWriter

Abstract class that should be extended by all ReportWriter implementations to support writing reports to files and writing to console.

Author:
Stefan Glase
